com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.setting

Class DynamicColorPreference

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.widget.FrameLayout
          • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.setting.DynamicPreference
            • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.setting.DynamicSimplePreference
              • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.setting.DynamicColorPreference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener, android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class DynamicColorPreference
extends DynamicSimplePreference
    A DynamicSimplePreference to implement the functionality of a color picker by using the DynamicColorPopup and DynamicColorDialog.

      • onUpdate

        protected void onUpdate()
        Description copied from class: DynamicPreference
        This method will be called whenever there is a change in the preference attributes or parameters.

        It is better to do any real time calculation like updating the value string or checked state in this method.

        Overrides:
